000010 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # addi $r0 $r0 0x0
111111 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # asrt $r0 0
000010 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 0x1
111111 00001 00000 0000000000000001     # asrt $r1 1
000010 00001 00010 0000000000000010     # addi $r1 $r2 0x2
111111 00010 00000 0000000000000011     # asrt $r2 3
000010 00010 00011 0000000000000011     # addi $r2 $r3 0x3
111111 00011 00000 0000000000000110     # asrt $r3 6
000010 00011 00100 0000000000000100     # addi $r3 $r4 0x4
111111 00100 00000 0000000000001010     # asrt $r4 10
000010 00100 00101 0000000000000101     # addi $r4 $r5 0x5
111111 00101 00000 0000000000001111     # asrt $r5 15
000010 00101 00110 0000000000000110     # addi $r5 $r6 0x6
111111 00110 00000 0000000000010101     # asrt $r6 21
000010 00110 00111 0000000000000111     # addi $r6 $r7 0x7
111111 00111 00000 0000000000011100     # asrt $r7 28
000010 00111 01000 1111111111111001     # addi $r7 $r8 -0x7
111111 01000 00000 0000000000010101     # asrt $r8 21
000010 01000 01001 1111111111111010     # addi $r8 $r9 -0x6
111111 01001 00000 0000000000001111     # asrt $r9 15
000010 01001 01010 1111111111111011     # addi $r9 $r10 -0x5
111111 01010 00000 0000000000001010     # asrt $r10 10
000010 01010 01011 1111111111111100     # addi $r10 $r11 -0x4
111111 01011 00000 0000000000000110     # asrt $r11 6
000010 01011 01100 1111111111111101     # addi $r11 $r12 -0x3
111111 01100 00000 0000000000000011     # asrt $r12 3
000010 01100 01101 1111111111111110     # addi $r12 $r13 -0x2
111111 01101 00000 0000000000000001     # asrt $r13 1
000010 01101 01110 1111111111111111     # addi $r13 $r14 -0x1
111111 01110 00000 0000000000000000     # asrt $r14 0
111100 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000   # halt
